package.name: agv_manual_control
package.description: date: 2018-01-30 contents: - This package is used to publish the linear and angular velocity (cmd_vel) of AGV via "geometry_msgs/Twist". A reciever node is also created to test. - Current version: keyboard control by up-down left-right - Next version: PS2 control
package.author: Hoang, Ngoc-Bach
